greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Zero followed by partial sums of A008865.
formula: a(n) = sum(k^2-2, k=1...n-1) = A000330(n-1)-2*A000027(n-1)=(n-1)*(2*n^2-n-12)/6. [From Christoph Pacher (christoph.pacher(AT)ait.ac.at), Jul 23 2010]
mathematica: lst={0}; s=0; Do[s+=n^2 - 2; AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 5!}]; lst
xref: Cf. A008865 (n^2 - 2), A002522 (n^2 + 1), A145066 (partial sums of A002522, starting at n=1), A005563 ((n+1)^2 - 1), A051925 (zero followed by partial sums of A005563).
results.author: _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 30 2008
